Handcrafted, home-made masterpieces




Premium Materials

Our trombones use the shiniest brass which is sourced locally. This will increase the longevity of your purchase.

Fast Shipping

We make sure you recieve your trombone as soon as we have finished making it. We also provide free returns if
you are not satisfied.

Quality Assurance

For every purchase you make, we will ensure there are no damages or faults and we will check and test the pitch of
your instrument.
